DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine if patients have more hypoglycemic episodes the first 3 days following pump start compared to their usual number of hypoglycemias with our actual pump initiation protocol.
DOC.brief_title: Hypoglycemia at Initiation of Pump Therapy in Children With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Patients with type 1 diabetes with followup at the CHU SainteJustine Patient about to start insulin pump therapy at the CHU SainteJustine Last HbA1c between 7.2 and 9.7% Informed and signed consent Type 1 diabetes diagnosed less than 1 year ago WITH total daily dose of insulin < 0.5U/kg/day Home of the patient at more than 50km of the CHU SainteJustine Refusal to consent
